sentence.Network_en: The beginnings of a moustache showed on his upper lip.
sentence.Network_cn: 他的上唇部位开始长胡子了。

sentence.Network_en: The discussions were the beginnings of a dialogue with Moscow.
sentence.Network_cn: 讨论拉开了同莫斯科对话的序幕。

sentence.Network_en: I had the beginnings of a headache.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 首先，尽管出于不得已，需要合弃对于起源问题（beginnings）的关键性考察，这一考察需要对希腊人以外的其他很多民族进行充足的 …
the president rose from humble beginnings ., 那位总统出身微贱.
Just as in a speech , beginnings and endings greatly enhance delivery ., 正像备稿演讲一样 , 良好的开场白和结语可以使你的讲评生色不少.
why are you love? 爱的理由beginnings 爱的起点friendship 友情

list.abs: 立冬英语怎么说？ 立冬英文简介 ... 二十四节气The  24 Solar Terms 立春 Spring begins 雨水 The rains.
英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(A) ... autoxidation 自然氧化 autumn begins 立秋 autumn 秋天.
大学英语四级常用词组 ... beat up and down 来回奔走 begin with 以…开始；开始于 to begin with 首先，第一.
关于夏天的英文单词都有哪些_百度知道 ... sunshade 阳伞立夏 summer begins 夏至 the Summer Solstice.

entry.def: The beginning of an event or process is the first part of it.

example.ex: This was also the beginning of her recording career...
example.tran: 这也是她唱片生涯的开始。

example.ex: Think of this as a new beginning.

entry.def: The beginnings of something are the signs or events which form the first part of it.

example.ex: I had the beginnings of a headache...
The discussions were the beginnings of a dialogue with Moscow.
example.tran: 讨论拉开了同莫斯科对话的序幕。

entry.def: The beginning of a period of time is the time at which it starts.

example.ex: The wedding will be at the beginning of March.

entry.def: The beginning of a piece of written material is the first words or sentences of it.

example.ex: ...the question which was raised at the beginning of this chapter.
example.tran: 在本章开头所提出的问题

entry.def: If you talk about the beginnings of a person, company, or group, you are referring to their backgrounds or origins.

example.ex: His views come from his own humble beginnings.
example.tran: 他的观点源于他卑微的出身。

entry.def: You use beginning to describe someone who is in the early stages of learning to do something.

example.ex: The people that she had in her classroom were beginning learners.
example.tran: 她带的这班学生都是初学者。
